name: FlyWrite
description:
FlyWrite is an observation of Yelp reviews in present day culture.  Inspired by the 2018 Global Game Jam prompt, "Transmission", FlyWrite puts the player in the seat of a sky writer operating their small business, taking on the request of their clientele to the best of their ability.  Various client requests are pinned up on the cork board at the office - try to replicate these requests! But prepare to be judged, and not always for the right reasons...

Mechanically, the game draws inspiration from deliberately frustrating games like Getting Over It, and Regular Human Basketball, mixing seemingly simple, yet infuriatingly elusive controls.

CONTROLS

The plane will always move forward. Use your mouse: swipe up to move faster, down to move slower, left and right to turn left and right. Left click to emit white smoke, right click to emit multicolored smoke.

Press the Spacebar when ready to be judged.

Created by Christopher Chung, Sahar Naderi, and Brian Kang.
